title: black wide a bit rounded rounded corners
content:
I love this font.

ID anyone?

thanks!

comments.content:
If this is a sign it might be lettering not based on any particular font.  
Perhaps by coincidence, Rexlia

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134021im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rexlia_5288.jpg)
 and Rexlia compressed to 75% width 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134021im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rexlia@75PctWidth_5814.jpg)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/rexlia/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/rexlia/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/rexlia/")  
Don
**[Torque (Ultra)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134021/http:/typesupply.com/fonts/torque)** by Type Supply [2009-2013] looks like an exact match

Good find Fivos. Working link [https://typesupply.com/fonts/torque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134021/https:/typesupply.com/fonts/torque "https://typesupply.com/fonts/torque")  
Don
